messages.body: 10 Dow Stocks Currently Testing Blockchain Technology $AAPL, $IBM, $BA, $MSFT, $KO, $CSCO, $WMT https://www.fool.com/investing/2018/04/01/10-dow-stocks-currently-testing-blockchain-technol.aspx

links.title: 10 Dow Stocks Currently Testing Blockchain Technology
links.description: Last year, the cryptocurrency market was unstoppable, with the aggregate value of all virtual currencies soaring by nearly $600 billion. The major catalyst to thank for this surge is blockchain technology. Blockchain is the digital, distributed, and decentralized ledger that records transactions in a transparent and unchanging manner, without the need for a financial intermediary.

links.title: It it time to buy?
links.description: Free After-Hours Update: The S&P500 bounced back Tuesday, recovering a big chunk of Monday's selloff. Things got ugly Monday after China announced 30 billion of retaliatory tariffs in response Trump's steel and aluminum tariffs. Fortunately the worst fears dissipated by Tuesday and the S&P500 reclaimed the 200dma and 2,600 support.

links.title: Market Wrap 4-3-2018. Don't back up the truck. QQQ. SPY.
links.description: Amid various calls by market pundits recently to buy the dip, IBD readers know that it's premature to do so. At some point, the major stock indexes will flash a sign of strength, indicating it's OK to nibble at some fundamentally and technically healthy stocks.
